attributes.action: After the coronavirus ends, a memorial to be put in London to the NHS workers.
attributes.additional_details: This would be a fitting tribute to the people who passed away and somewhere for their families to go and remember them proudly.  Along with members of the public who can also go and pay their respects.
attributes.background: A memorial to be erected in Parliament Square to remember the NHS workers who gave their lives fighting this virus. The memorial to have every name of every victim from the NHS.

rejection.details:
Decisions about installations on Parliament Square Garden are a matter for the London Assembly, not the Government or House of Commons.

You may wish to sign these petitions calling for similar actions:

A memorial for NHS, care, allied professionals, who die as a result of COVID:19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313328

Create a National Covid-19 Key worker memorial Commemorate the fallen: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315516

Commission a Memorial Plaque to honour and remember UK victims of the Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310097

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
